casebody.data:
KANSAS, petitioner,
v.
Jonathan D. CARR. No. 14-449. Supreme Court of the United States March 30, 2015.

Opinion

Motion of respondent for leave to proceed in forma pauperis granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the Supreme Court of Kansas granted limited to Questions 1 and 3 presented by the petition. The cases are consolidated and a total of one hour is allotted for oral argument.
